title: Homemade beef and barley stew
ingredients: ['2 sprays low fat cooking spray', '500g organic beef chuck or lean braising steak, trimmed and cut into 5cm (2 in) cubes', '2 garlic cloves, halved', '3 bay leaves', '6 juniper berries, lightly crushed', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '1 large onion, chopped', '55g (2 oz) pearl barley', '5 large carrots, cut into large chunks', '5 celery sticks, sliced', '1 swede, cut into chunks', '700ml (1 pt 3 fl oz) beef stock', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons beef gravy granules']
